scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run compile
scripts.deploy: test -f .env && export $(egrep -v '^#' .env | xargs) && node .build/deployer-cli.js deploy -c config.json -s security.json
scripts.remove-airnode: test -f .env && export $(egrep -v '^#' .env | xargs) && node .build/deployer-cli.js remove-airnode -c config.json -s security.json
scripts.remove-mnemonic: test -f .env && export $(egrep -v '^#' .env | xargs) && node .build/deployer-cli.js remove-mnemonic -c config.json -s security.json
scripts.sls:config: test -f .env && export $(egrep -v '^#' .env | xargs) && sls config credentials --provider aws --key $AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID --secret $AWS_SECRET_KEY
scripts.sls:deploy: test -f .env && export $(egrep -v '^#' .env | xargs) && sls deploy --config serverless.aws.yml --providerIdShort $PROVIDER_ID_SHORT --awsRegion $AWS_REGION
scripts.sls:remove: test -f .env && export $(egrep -v '^#' .env | xargs) && sls remove --config serverless.aws.yml --providerIdShort $PROVIDER_ID_SHORT --awsRegion $AWS_REGION
scripts.sls:invoke: test -f .env && export $(egrep -v '^#' .env | xargs) && sls invoke --function test --config serverless.aws.yml --providerIdShort 9e5a89d --awsRegion $AWS_REGION
